snippet: Twelve men said to be linked to Al Qaeda’s branch in the Indian subcontinent were held in raids across Dhaka by an elite police unit, officials said.
abstract: Twelve suspected Al Qaeda members are arrested in Bangladesh.

byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR
byline.contributor: Julfikar Ali Manik reported from Dhaka, and Nida Najar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Twelve men said to be linked to Al Qaeda’s branch in the Indian subcontinent were held in raids across Dhaka by an elite police unit, officials said.

headline.main: Bangladesh Police Arrest 12 Men Suspected of Qaeda Ties
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Bangladesh: Terror Suspects Seized
